title: The Princess
description: Marina Adams is part of the super secret military group IAR - infiltrate, ascertain, and retrieve - by any means necessary. Her latest target is a Middle Eastern prince who asks to take part in a military training class inside the US. She is assigned to engage him and spy on him. They have tried to get close to the prince before and failed. Things are going great, until he asks her out. She realizes how easily she could fall for him. The lines begin to blur when he takes her back to his country. Can she continue to do her job and fall in love? Can she protect the prince and her own country? Which will she choose, love or her career?This book is intended for adults!
author: Melissa Silvey
